def decode_base64(encoded_s):
    valid_chars = ''
    cleaned_s = ''.join((c if c in valid_chars else '_' for c in encoded_s))
    padding_needed = len(cleaned_s) % 4
    if padding_needed:
        cleaned_s += '=' * (4 - padding_needed)
    decoded_s = base64.b64decode(cleaned_s)
    return decoded_s
